column4: how can i password protect internet connection for certain time
is there any software to lock internet in linux

you can use squid to control access, but that requires a squid server - http://www.linuxhomenetworking.com/wiki/index.php/Quick_HOWTO_:_Ch32_:_Controlling_Web_Access_with_Squid#Restricting_Web_Access_By_Time
